statements: SELECT * FROM Awards WHERE id = 1;
SELECT celebrity_name, award_type FROM Celebrities WHERE award_type = 'Oscar';
SELECT celebrity_name FROM Awards WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY celebrity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE celebrity_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, celebrity_name, award_type FROM Celebrities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE award_type = 'Oscar';
SELECT celebrity_name, award_type FROM Awards WHERE award_type = 'Emmy' ORDER BY celebrity_name DESC;
SELECT id, celebrity_name, award_type FROM Awards WHERE celebrity_name LIKE 'Brad%' ORDER BY award_type ASC, id DESC;
SELECT count(*) as total_awards, award_type FROM Awards GROUP BY award_type HAVING total_awards > 2;
SELECT celebrity_name, count(*) as total_awards FROM Awards GROUP BY celebrity_name HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_awards DESC, celebrity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT celebrity_name FROM celebrities;
SELECT celebrity_id, celebrity_name FROM celebrities;
SELECT * FROM awards WHERE celebrity_id = 1;
SELECT award_type, celebrity_name FROM awards INNER JOIN celebrities ON awards.celebrity_id = celebrities.celebrity_id;
SELECT celebrity_name FROM celebrities WHERE celebrity_id = 1;
SELECT celebrity_name, award_type FROM celebrities JOIN awards ON celebrities.celebrity_id = awards.celebrity_id;
SELECT DISTINCT celebrity_name FROM celebrities WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(celebrity_name) > 5 ORDER BY celebrity_name DESC;
SELECT celebrity_name, COUNT(award_type) AS total_awards FROM celebrities LEFT JOIN awards ON celebrities.celebrity_id = awards.celebrity_id GROUP BY celebrity_name HAVING total_awards > 0;
SELECT celebrity_name, award_type FROM celebrities JOIN awards ON celebrities.celebrity_id = awards.celebrity_id WHERE celebrity_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY award_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM awards
SELECT name, category FROM awards WHERE year = 2021
SELECT id, name, nationality FROM celebrities WHERE nationality = 'American'
SELECT * FROM celebrities ORDER BY birthdate DESC
SELECT name, category, year FROM awards ORDER BY category
SELECT name, category, year FROM awards WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC, name ASC
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND YEAR(birthdate) < 1980 ORDER BY birthdate ASC
SELECT id, name, category FROM awards WHERE category LIKE '%music%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name, category, year FROM awards WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1990-12-31'
SELECT * FROM awards WHERE celebrity_id = 1;
SELECT award_name, celebrity_id FROM awards WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name FROM celebrities WHERE id = 2;
SELECT award_name, celebrity_id FROM awards ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM awards WHERE celebrity_id = 1 ORDER BY award_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT award_name, celebrity_id FROM awards WHERE id = 2
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT DISTINCT celebrity_id FROM awards WHERE award_name = 'Oscar'
SELECT name, award_name FROM celebrities JOIN awards ON celebrities.id = awards.celebrity_id
SELECT * FROM celebrity;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrity;
SELECT award_name, award_type FROM award;
SELECT celebrity_id, award_id FROM celebrity_award;
SELECT celebrity_id, grammy FROM celebrity_grammy;
SELECT * FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT celebrity.name, award.award_name FROM celebrity JOIN celebrity_award ON celebrity.id = celebrity_award.celebrity_id JOIN award ON award.id = celebrity_award.award_id WHERE award.award_type = 'Oscar';
SELECT celebrity.name, celebrity.age, celebrity_grammy.grammy FROM celebrity JOIN celebrity_grammy ON celebrity.id = celebrity_grammy.celebrity_id WHERE celebrity_grammy.grammy = true;

SELECT celebrity.name, award.award_name, award.award_type FROM celebrity JOIN celebrity_award ON celebrity.id = celebrity_award.celebrity_id JOIN award ON award.id = celebrity_award.award_id WHERE celebrity.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_oscars FROM celebrity JOIN celebrity_award ON celebrity.id = celebrity_award.celebrity_id JOIN award ON award.id = celebrity_award.award_id WHERE award.award_type = 'Oscar';
